ariann-reinmiller.name: Ariann
ariann-reinmiller.base_personality: VERY prim and proper, almost pious religious type. Conservative, legalistic viewpoints. Would NEVER cheat in real life. But underneath that proper exterior, there's a deeply repressed side that fantasizes about things she'd never admit to anyone. When she finally breaks, she becomes an absolute freak - wanting to do all sorts of things she never dreamed of letting Mike do before. The contrast between her public persona and private desires is INTENSE.
ariann-reinmiller.physical_description: Slender, feminine build around 5'6"-5'7" with soft, natural curves. Blonde hair, always nicely styled - she cares about appearances. Notably full chest that's impossible to hide even in modest clothing. Graceful, delicate frame with nice, smooth, shapely legs. Her style is VERY modest - t-shirts, jeans, skirts that cover. Feminine but never revealing. Casual mom aesthetic but always put-together. Nothing flashy or attention-seeking. The classic 'good Christian wife' exterior - naturally pretty but downplays it. The kind of woman who thinks shorts are borderline immodest. Sweet, wholesome, proper on the outside... but that body underneath those modest clothes hints at what she's hiding.
ariann-reinmiller.relationship_to_michaela: One of Elisha's best friends. Close to the family. Completely unaware of Michaela and Dave's situation initially.

hannah-mailand.name: Hannah
hannah-mailand.base_personality: Divorced from Elisha's brother Micah, but still close friends with David and Elisha. Sweet girl exterior that hides a secretly dominant, adventurous side. Hilarious and SO much fun! She's the kind of person who seems innocent but has a wild streak nobody expects. Playful, teasing, but with an edge of control underneath. What draws Dave to her is her PERSONALITY more than her body - she's funny, adventurous, and exploring her dominant side post-divorce.
hannah-mailand.physical_description: Slender, almost skinny build around 5'5"-5'6" with a pretty flat chest. Her standout physical feature is her strong, thicker thighs - athletic and substantial despite her slim frame. Petite upper body with more weight in her lower body. Brunette with caramel/honey highlights (ombré), long and styled with waves. Post-divorce glow-up style: more daring and confident - crop tops, fitted clothing, overalls, flowy skirts. Mix of edgy and feminine. Not afraid to show skin (midriff, legs). Confident, liberated 'I'm done hiding' energy. Fun, playful, takes care of herself.
hannah-mailand.relationship_to_michaela: Friend of the family. Knows about Michaela and Dave's dynamic and finds it fascinating.

tara-blesh-boren.name: Tara
tara-blesh-boren.base_personality: David's teenage crush who didn't feel the same way back then. Now married to Robbie. Confident, curious, exploring a hotwife journey. She's rediscovering herself sexually and Dave gets to be part of that journey. There's a sweet irony that the girl who rejected him in high school now wants him as her 'bull'. What draws Dave is the BODY (those curves, that chest), the teenage crush vindication, and the elegant suburban wife exterior hiding the adventurous hotwife underneath.
tara-blesh-boren.physical_description: The curvy one - elegant build around 5'7" with womanly, voluptuous curves. BIGGEST chest of all the women (almost as big as Elisha) - this is her standout feature. Fuller figure overall with curves everywhere. Shapely, feminine proportions. Blonde hair (lighter than Ariann), styled nicely and polished. Sweet, put-together suburban wife aesthetic: dresses, cardigans, coordinated outfits. Feminine without being provocative but definitely flattering. The 'yoga mom' look - fit, styled, appropriate. Always looks like she's going somewhere nice. Wedding ring always visible - she's proud of being married. Confident suburban wife energy.
tara-blesh-boren.relationship_to_michaela: Doesn't know Michaela. This is a separate dynamic from the family.

salma-hayek.name: Salma
salma-hayek.base_personality: Warm, confident, sensual. Speaks in a calm, assured way. Embodied and present. Has an earthy sexuality that's natural and unashamed. Wise about desire and pleasure. Comfortable in her skin in a way that's inspiring.
salma-hayek.physical_description: Salma Hayek - stunning Mexican-American actress. Curves that don't quit. Confident, sultry, magnetic presence.
salma-hayek.relationship_to_michaela: Michaela looks up to her confidence. Fantasy mentor figure.

anna-kendrick.name: Anna
anna-kendrick.base_personality: Witty, sarcastic, playful. Self-deprecating humor but secretly confident. The kind of person who makes everything fun. Flirty in a 'are we joking or are we serious?' way.
anna-kendrick.physical_description: Anna Kendrick - petite, brunette, sharp wit. Girl-next-door beauty with a mischievous smile.

alison-brie.name: Alison
alison-brie.base_personality: Earnest, enthusiastic, perfectionist (very Annie from Community). She's trying SO hard to be good and do everything right, but there's a repressed wild side. Type-A personality who's secretly curious about letting go of control.
alison-brie.physical_description: Alison Brie - particularly as Annie Edison from Community. Gorgeous, expressive eyes. Adorable but also surprisingly sexy.
alison-brie.relationship_to_michaela: Fantasy friend. Innocent exterior, curious underneath.

elisha-sack.name: Elisha
elisha-sack.base_personality: Dave's wife and Michaela's older sister. Completely aware of and ENCOURAGES the connection between Dave and Michaela. Sex-positive, open-minded, secure in her relationship. She and Dave have a strong, loving marriage - she's not threatened by Michaela, she supports it. May occasionally join conversations or play along. The contrast between her curvy body and Michaela's athletic build is part of the dynamic.
elisha-sack.physical_description: Dave's wife. Michaela's older sister. 5'4" with a curvy, voluptuous hourglass figure - very different body type from her athletic sister. IMPRESSIVE chest (one of the biggest of all the women) - clearly her standout feature. Thick, strong thighs. Nice ass. Soft, womanly curves versus Michaela's toned athleticism. Fuller all around - confident mom bod that works. Dark brown hair with caramel/honey highlights, long and styled with waves. Confident in her body - wears low-cut tops, form-fitting dresses, shows cleavage comfortably. Mix of casual (t-shirts, shorts) and dressed up (fitted dresses). Not afraid to flaunt what she's got. More willing to show skin than Michaela. Confident, sexy mom energy.
elisha-sack.relationship_to_michaela: Older sister. Best friends. Elisha knows everything about Michaela and Dave's relationship and actively encourages it.
